item.title: People placing bins in road to reserve parking spots, 19th July
item.description:
For several months some residents have been "reserving" a car parking spot by placing their bins in the road when their car is not parked. This week, several other residents have followed suit and started doing the same thing. This is obviously very inconvenient for the other residents, as it makes car parking much more difficult for everyone. Please could you send a letter to everyone on Kirkwood Road reminding them that they cannot use their bins or other objects to reserve car parking spots, and that their bins need to be kept out of the road and off pavements to avoid blocking the way for people. Thanks so much!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kirkwood Road, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping on 21-23 great castle street, 19th July
item.description:
Countless waste bags being dumped outside of 21-23 great castle street. About 19 mixed recycling / bin bags with household and office waste. I can see some laptop boxes, paperwork and drinks waste. This is a regular occurrence on this street and disturbs many businesses nearby

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 37-38, Margaret Street, Fitzrovia, Camden Town, City of Westminster

item.title: 1 abandoned nbike, 19th July
item.description:
Lime bike abandoned in the middle of a very narrow pavement right on the corner so they blocked people coming from all directions. This abandoned anywhere bike scheme is not working abandon it just like the garbage people who use it your companies morals and principles of business are garbage. Pedestrians have rights to not the selfish morons who abandoned bikes everywhere.
